messages.content: Standing up for Brecon & Radnorshire. I'll be a strong advocate for you, and secure a good deal for Brecon & Radnorshire.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tactical voting is a dangerous gamble here
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose the Tories, vote for Dan Lodge, the Labour candidate. Sending a Lib Dem to Westminster resulted in a coalition with the Tories in 2010.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Make Brexit work for Brecon & Radnorshire
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for a deal that keeps access to the Single Market, promote jobs, trade and tourism, and protect farmers with continued access to the EU Single Market.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Responsible politics: respect and foreign aid
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Maintain overseas aid at 0.7%, balance the need for real enemies rather than manufactured ones, and support our country's involvement in the international system.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Tactical voting is a dangerous gamble here. Sending a Lib Dem to Westminster resulted in a coalition with the Tories in 2010.

issues.brexitEurope: Make Brexit work for Brecon & Radnorshire. Fight for a deal that keeps access to the Single Market.
issues.economy: Promote jobs, trade and tourism, and protect farmers.

community.content: Dan's very down to earth for a banker—they've been out talking to local residents together.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'll be a strong advocate for you, and secure a good deal for Brecon & Radnorshire.

politicalExperience.achievements: Dan has worked in PR for 15 years and his work includes representing children and young victims. He has been a member of the Labour party all his adult life, since 1992. Dan Lodge was born and schooled in Wales and is 43.

endorsements.endorser: Linda Edwards, Welsh & Labour campaigner Llandrindod Wells
endorsements.endorsement: Dan's very down to earth for a banker, we've been out talking to local residents together. Dan gets it, freeze rents so people can know where they'll be living and a living wage of £10 per hour. Tory cuts from Westminster threatening our future, I'm voting Labour.

images.caption: Dan Lodge with Mid and West Wales AMs Eluned Morgan & Joyce Watson
Dan Lodge, Welsh Labour candidate for Brecon and Radnorshire
Dan Lodge and Welsh Labour will fight Tory Cuts
